## What is Quarto?

![](./pics/quarto.png){width=20%}(唸"闊拓") is an open-source (MIT license) scientific and technical publishing system built on [Pandoc](https://pandoc.org/) via extended markdown format (***.qmd***) files. It allows you to create dynamic documents, reports, presentations, and websites using a single authoring framework. Quarto supports multiple programming languages, including R, Python, and Julia, making it a versatile tool for data analysis and visualization.


* Official website: [quarto.org](https://quarto.org/)

* Github repo: [github.com/quarto-dev/](https://github.com/quarto-dev/)

[![](./pics/qmd-how-it-works.png)](https://quarto.org/docs/get-started/hello/text-editor.html#rendering)

## Quarto Input/Output

* 預設輸入檔案格式 (***.qmd***, ***.ipynb***, ***.md***, ***.Rmd***)
    * 在 . 或 _ 開頭的目錄名稱內的檔案不處理
    * README.md/README.qmd 檔預設忽略

* 預設輸出檔案格式 HTML，但可透過設定檔或命令列參數指定其他格式
    * [Quarto Output Formats](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/all-formats.html)<br/>(html/pdf/docx/odt/epub等)
    * [Support Publishing Services](https://quarto.org/docs/publishing/#getting-started)<br/>(Quarto Pub/GitHub Pages/Netlify/Post Connect/Confluence等)

## Why Use Quarto?

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="60%"}
身為碼農，最討厭的就是[***寫文件***]{style="font-size: 130%"}，寫一堆各式各樣格式的文件，還有些檔案格式:

1. 無法有效版控/比對檔案。<br/>
2. 表達某些內容種類<br/>(source code/execution result)<br/>不友善得花時間螢幕截圖/手工兜。

整個就是麻煩事。
:::

::: {.column width="40%"}
![](pics/programmers_hate_documentation.png)
:::

::::

## 

Quarto 讓寫文件內容統一於 Quarto 的 Markdown 格式（***.qmd***）檔案，再<br/>[**一份原始文件內容多種格式輸出**]{style="font-size: 110%"}(HTML/PDF/Word/PowerPoint/...)，減少寫文件的麻煩事。

![](pics/quarto_workflow.svg){fig-align="center"}

類似跨平台開發框架/遊戲引擎，寫一次原始碼，編譯成多平台的執行檔。
